entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 08:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
